### Uncode when necessary 

If you’ve coded something incorrectly, you can **uncode text** in as many ways as you can code. 

After highlighting the text, you can either: 

1. 	Right-click and choose uncode. 

![](images/uncode method 1.png)



2. Select ‘uncode’ in the document ribbon at the top: 


![](images/uncode method 2.png)



3. Use the bottom coding bar button /	keyboard shortcut (CTRL+SHIFT+F9); 


![](images/uncode method 3.png)
